definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: This marks twenty-four hours since I'm stuck and chipping away.
sentences.chinese: 這標誌着二四小時因爲我卡住，小打小鬧。

sentences.english: The police tried to trace his lapse into petty crime.
sentences.chinese: 警察試圖追蹤他小打小鬧作奸犯科的緣由。
